ygData.subject: $49.95 a month!! YEAH RIGHT!
ygData.msgSnippet: I love that little question they asked me when I logged on last week. Would you be willing to pay $49.95/month for Premium Customer Service and a population
ygData.messageBody:
I love that little question they asked me when I
logged on last week. Would you be willing to pay
$49.95/month for "Premium Customer Service" and a "population
Cap" on your server?<br><br>What a F-ing joke! If
anyone pressed the yes button when asked this...they
need to get examined by a shrink.<br><br>With the
shitty ass customer service present at Verant today (I
know firsthand, it is terrible), how does Verant hope
to convince me that they even know what "Premium
Customer Service" means???!!!<br><br>To them "Premium" is
most likely what other "Reputable" companies would
consider "Bare Minimum Service".<br><br>$49.95 a
month??!!! What a bunch of greedy ass bastards (excuse my
French). Let's look at some numbers.<br><br>There are
currently over 100,000 ACTIVE SUBSCRIBERS at Verant. This
number is VERY conservative, im sure the actual figure
is much higher.<br><br>We will work with 100,000 for
ease of use.<br>Each of these people pay an average of
$8.95/month to play everquest. That comes to $895,000 PER
MONTH...every single month!!!<br><br>That comes to $10,740,000
per YEAR!!!!<br><br>Now the greedy asses want to kick
it to $49.95/month on a voluntary basis. Let us
again seek to predict the future and say that a mere
10% of active subscribers fall for this pathetic
ploy.<br><br>That would mean 10,000 (conservatively) people would
agree to pay the $49.95/month which comes to $410,000
MORE COMING IN EACH MONTH. Note: I deducted the
$89,500 these 10,000 are already paying from the original
figure of $499,500.<br><br>This would mean Verant would
bring in an additional $4,920,000/ per year....for
doing absolutely NOTHING that they should not already
be doing!!!!<br><br>Rally together people.....Do not
EVER agree to do this, when it is offered in the
future.<br><br>Think about it, it makes NO sense. IF you agree with me
on this issue...can I get a HELL
YEAH?!<br><br>MrHappy
